title: Bug 26362StyledText  investigate necessary state changes between handleTextChanging and handleTextChanged
description: According to the article, one should send handleTextChanging event, updatestyles, then send handleTextChanged event.If during the update styles step,one calls style range API (e.g., setStyleRange, replaceStyleRanges), thecaretOffset could get out of sync.Also need to consider other state thatcould be out of sync.
